import React, { useReducer } from 'react'; import EditDeliveryAddress from './EditDeliveryAddress'; export default function AddressCard({ address, editAddress = (f) => f }) { const [form, toggleForm] = useReducer((form) => !form, false); return (
{address.rank}

{address.line1}

{address.line2}

{address.city}

{address.postcode}
{' '}
); }
